name: Muggy Lake
description:
You are an old man and your dog is lost in this dark lake, but there is something else lurking here.  Use tools scattered around the lake to your advantage.

Controls:

WASD - Move Boat

Left Click - Interact

To use an object Left Click on item in boat and click elsewhere

Credits:
